RHighlight.p: The beautiful deserted beachside location; the rustic architecture and use of natural materials; the gorgeous gardens and the serenity, all combined to make our stay at Taman Ahimsa a very special and unique experience. Also of note are the staff, who were very sweet, and the healthy juices, which were superb.

RSurroundArea.p: If you choose to stay at Taman Ahimsa, your visit may well be for a yoga or meditation retreat, in which case you probably won’t want to go out much at all. There are not many man-made attractions in the neighbourhood, but it is fun to explore the beautiful coastline and countryside by foot or bicycle (there are six bikes available), and the roads are mainly flat and quiet. Five minutes’ walk up the beach is the small sea temple of Pura Bata Ngandang; it sits on a rocky outcrop and is a bit like a miniature version of the famous Tanah Lot, which is located two or three kilometres further up the coast (9km by road). Heading inland, before you reach the main road, is a village temple, where there always seems to be a lot of colourful activity.

ROverallComments.p:
If you’re looking for nightlife and shopping, Taman Ahimsa is probably not the villa for you, but if you want to retreat from the world, awaken your soul, practice yoga and meditation, eat healthy food and experience therapeutic massages, this transformative place will inspire you more than you ever imagined possible. Even if you’re not really into the spiritual concept, and you don’t understand much about chakras, mandala thankas, crystals and healing circles, you will still appreciate the beautiful close-to-nature setting, the sight and sound of the sea, the romantic architecture and the peaceful ambiance.
Although the villa promotes the holistic concept, you don’t have to be on a spiritual retreat to come here; but who knows, you might just be inspired to experience something new. The gardens and interiors are fun to explore too, in every room we found a traditional Balinese instrument, an extraordinary crystal or an antique, or a funky lamp or table. Floors and doors are made from old teak, ironwood and two-toned tamarind wood, which has been recycled from boats and old buildings. Please note the villa has a no smoking policy.
Taman Ahimsa is managed by Fivelements, a company that specialises in holistic healing retreats, centred at Puri Ahimsa, 20km away. For a truly amazing experience arrange for the villa’s driver to take you to Fivelements Puri Ahimsa for a holistic treatment performed by an authentic Balinese healer.

RUnpleasantSurprise.p: The TV room is cosy, but it adjoins one of the bedrooms, so is not the most practical. On the other hand, Taman Ahimsa is not really a TV-watching kind of place. We could have done with some books, games and DVDs though, so remember to bring some with you.

REVIEW.Name: Teong Siew Meng
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This place is good and in a good quite location. The swimming pool is very big and the open layout nice. Service was very good and the staffs were very helpful. My mother and I love Balinese open style design, so The Ahimsa Villa is perfect. The Ahimsa provides a transfer service, which we used were really helps us to solve all the traveling problems.

REVIEW.Name: jack canfield
REVIEW.ROverallComments: An amazing stay at Villa Taman Ahimsa! The grounds are stunning, and the oceanfront views cannot be beat. Each night we feel asleep to the crashing waves. What an experience! And the staff here are truly the best! Thank you for truly making our stay wonderful and for going above and beyond. We will never forget out stay and experience at Taman Ahimsa! Great for larger groups, couples, and families!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Wedding International, PT Bali Wedding International, PT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very happy with the experience in Taman Ahimsa. Staff were very professional and the villa has exceptional view. We will certainly come back.

REVIEW.Name: Shabana none
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The exact location of the villa is somewhat difficult for taxi drivers to locate especially if you arrive in the evening. The villa itself is extremely beautiful and a great retreat especially if you want to get away from the hustle and bustle of city life and looking for a place to unwind in tranquility. The view from the pool of the beach is breathtaking. The rooms are spacious with a modern yet rural feel. The staff are friendly and cater to your needs. The location is far from Kuta and Seminyak so you will need to use a driver if you want to do shopping but this place is a perfect stay as you can order in and enjoy the facilities the villa has to offer.

REVIEW.Name: David EMERY
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
I consider myself pretty well travelled, so it's rare that my breath is completely taken away, but Taman Ahimsa exceeded all expectations. It may be my favourite place on the planet, particularly because of the delightful staff led by Prahma.
I celebrated my 30th birthday here with eight friends and family and though we had made a number of plans to explore the area, aside from a sunset visit to Tanah Lot (great for holiday snaps) and two dinners out, we did not leave. Get the yoga teachers and masseuses to come to you and kick back by the pool, on the day beds, and bury yourself in the black sand on the beach.
The rooms themselves are truly palatial and the bathrooms are stunning. I could not recommend this highly enough for a grown family or a group of friends.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Wedding International, PT Bali Wedding International, PT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had the pleasure of staying at Taman Ahimsa and holding our wedding within the grouds. The villa and staff were absolutely superb and we could not fault them in any way. The accomodation and grounds are stunning and the food was delicious. We will definately be returning!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Exclusive Wedding Bali Exclusive Wedding
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
Taman Ahimsa was one of the best accommodations we've ever stayed at. We got married there and stayed with our wedding party. The place is beautiful and has a lovely bali charm. The pool looking out onto the ocean is breathtaking. The living area was spacious and comfortable. We were impressed with the following - the pest control - there was a serious lack of mosquitos, even in the outdoor bathrooms - the staff was amazing. They were able to accommodate everything - arranging drivers, massages, manicures in addition to our requests related to the wedding. - The chef - the food was delicious. - The turn down service in the evening, attention to details - On the night of our wedding, we got an extra special turn down service with rose petals on the bed and rose petals which spelled out our initials in the bath.
It is in Cemagi, rural Bali with not much else around. You definitely need a driver if you want to go somewhere. The closest tourist attraction would be Tanah Lot. I would definitely stay here again for a getaway (not to explore Bali) - and so much fun to be able to stay with 6 other couples or a large family.

REVIEW.Name: Jacquievans Slaughter
REVIEW.ROverallComments: amazing destination. friendly staff. incredible location.

REVIEW.Name: La Vie Elite Travel Service
REVIEW.ROverallComments: good location & good service

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wow! What an amazing property, the staff is so wonderful and gracious, the surroundings are simply stunning, cuisine and service are out of this world. We visited from California, USA where we are known for hospitality and cuisine, Bali over exceeded our expectation and we would love to return again.

REVIEW.Name: Onefine stay/Travel Keys Onefine stay/Travel Keys
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had no idea how relaxing and peaceful the villa was going to be. Our stay exceeded our expectation in every way. The staff were the best from the gardener to the manager. The views are incredible and the pool superb. We loved every aspect of our stay. Definitely a place to come to for special event. Thank you all. We will long remember you.

REVIEW.Name: Widjaja Megain
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We decided to book the whole 7 bedrooms villa and it was amazing. Staying here not only gives us a sense of Bali that other places gives but an additional "traditional" feeling. The finishing touch on the place would be the people. The courtesies, always helping to provide for us, the best stay in our lives. I'd like to thank to Ms Prama, Mirah, Edi for all the smiles, service and help during our stay. This is a wonderful place and we are sure to return.

REVIEW.Name: Angelina Shin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Taman Ahimsa is a dream! We had wonderful high expectations but this place rose above and beyond! All twelve of us fell in love with Taman Ahimsa. The food, staff, scenery and facilities are all outstanding. Most importantly, Taman Ahimsa created the perfect back drop for our wedding. It was beautiful beyond words. The staffs including Prama, were so kind and professionally warm. Thank you for helping create life long memories. We will never forget our stay here. Thank you again for all your extraordinary hospitality.

REVIEW.Name: Catherine Allchin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a wonderful stay! Beautiful view, nice staff and delicious food. Thank you for everything.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A wonderful experience - absolutely beautiful people - wonderful team and manager. We had a fantastic time. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Diane Granger Granger
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa was absolutely beautiful and the staff was wonderful. The food was outstanding. We could not have asked for a better experience. Far exceeded our expectations.

REVIEW.Name: Daniel Cooper
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the most amazing stay in paradise! We had the most beautiful, magical wedding and Taman Ahimsa was the perfect location. The grounds, staff, furniture, rooms, outlook and vibe was so serene, relaxing and enjoyable. We wouldn't have asked for a more amazing location to spend our special day with family and friends. The food has been delicious and all of the staff have been a pleasure to deal with. Thank you all

REVIEW.Name: Katie Ellis
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a beautiful location!!! We could not thank the staff enough for how welcoming, helpful and kind they were during our stay. The service, food and friendliness was amazing. Our wedding day here was all we had hoped it could be and will definitely be coming back again. thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Wedding Organizer / Bali wedding services Bali Wedding Organizer / Bali wedding services
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A beautiful place in an astonishing setting, the perfect location for family reunion. We have been honored to spend our wedding day here together with our Italian and Kazakh families. Thank you very much for the incredible service and never ending patience. We were amazed with the endless vegetarian menus, a prefect match for an eco and sustainable villa like Taman Ahimsa, a truly peaceful garden.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for your hospitality. We have a great wedding celebration and amazing, relaxing stay at Villa Taman Ahimsa. Breathtaking view, very peaceful, serene, comfortable,.... no words can describe this amazing villa. Beautiful memory, beautiful place, and beautiful celebration. We have been so lucky to find this little treasure in Bali. Thank you to all the staff who have been very honest, supportive, friendly and humble. We will remember it and hopefully we get to come back again one day.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had the most amazing time at Taman Ahimsa and have everything about our holiday. Wonderful people - Prama, Edi, Sri, Chef and everyone were incredible helpful and great fun (fantastic dancer at birthday celebrations). We also loved the Balinese cooking and our trip to the market and cooking class. Thank you all so much for the most restful and lovely holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Chirag Patel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We were a group of 14 people with children , had excellent time in the villa. the staff was extremely attentive to our needs , food prepared by the chef was excellent. overall was great place with excellent location . Would give 11/10 marks to the staff for there service and hospitality. We forgot some money in the room on our departure and Ida was kind enough to travel to the airport to handover the money which was very nice and caring about her.

REVIEW.Name: Agoda - ID
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This villa was love at first sight. I can't seem to think of any better villa than this. You've been a magical place for my partner's 30th birthday! Thank you so much Prama for assisting and accommodating for all our need. All the best and hope to come back soon.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We found paradise here! Taman Ahimsa is truly the most beautiful place and Prama and all staff have been amazing in every way - taking perfect care to our every need. Chef Nyoman and his staff made every meal a delight! Thank you for everything - we loved my son and husband birthday celebration and new year's eve could not have been better! The food, the decoration, music and dancer! Thank you for creating a perfect place for us to create eternal family memories! We loved every second and even after 10 days hated to leave - we will keep the beautiful villa and Bali in our heart forever.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Prama and all of the staff were all absolutely amazing. Everyone was so attentive and kind. We were here for wedding and everyone here went above and beyond. This trip will forever be remembered by all. There is no doubt we will be returning to Bali, especially here to Taman Ahimsa.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Reservation Surprise Villa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We very like Villa Taman Ahimsa. This is an amazing villa. The staff are all very good. I and my friends all satisfied with the services. This villa is very beautiful. Each room are particularly warmth. Garden is also very beautiful. Sea view is very nice. Thank you very much to give us a very good holiday time.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Taman Ahimsa is the most beautiful villa of i lived before. And the service is very good and very nice. thanks all the Taman Ahimsa, you gave us amazing holiday

REVIEW.Name: Xue Zhang
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for amazing week! We loved staying at your villa, thank you for looking after us so well! We were here for a family wedding and have had a wonderful time. The villa and grounds are lovely and the staff could not have been more attentive. We hope to come back and visit you again soon in the future.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a blissful few days. We will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Wedding Helper Bali Wedding Helper
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I marry here. Very lovely place. Thank you. We will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very big and beautiful villa, decoration is very authentic Bali style. Great staff, nice, considerate and very helpful. We loved here a lot and will recommend to our friends.

REVIEW.Name: Peter Noble
REVIEW.ROverallComments: There could have been no better spot anywhere to celebrate a family reunion and a 50th birthday. The location is a dream come true, the food was out of this world, service and attention to detail one of a kind! Thank you for making our time here an unforgettable one! We shall never forget it!!

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This was a much needed getaway for us. What a peaceful, spiritual and therapeutic environment. What a welcome when we arrived! The property, management and staff exceeded our expectations. We will definitely come back to Bali and stay here again. Thank you Wayan - yoga teacher for enlightening us.

REVIEW.Name: Susan Chan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great location, friendly staff and great food. We had a wonderful and relaxing time. Too many good thoughts...so will let you imagine. We will definitely look to come back.

REVIEW.Name: Mathieu Loison
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Endroit sublime, serein.. Merci a toute l'equipe, pour votre gentillesse, votre disponibilite sens oublier la cuisine absolument delicieuse! On reviendra, on l'espere.

REVIEW.Name: Batik Bali Wedding Batik Bali Wedding
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful place to stay + attentive staff. Food was delicious + the best we had in Bali. Would love to come back + would definitely recommended.

REVIEW.Name: Michelle Pansino
REVIEW.ROverallComments: WOW, what an amazing villa! This was a dream come true, what a way to celebrate my 50th Birthday! Ms Prama you are an asset, to all the staff, you spoiled us all!. Service was impeccable! Location unforgettable! Would love to come back one day, possibly a wedding, who knows.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for making our wedding and stay a wonderful experience.

REVIEW.Name: Goodland Bali Tour
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very kindly staff!!! Beautiful room!! Beautiful Pool! What's a amazing people who always helped us so much!! Especially Edi, you tried to make us beautiful memories! and Ayu, you kindly supported us every time!! We had great moments and and definitely want to come back here. Thank you for everything

REVIEW.Name: Debra Counsell
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Where to start! The 10 of us have had the most wonderful week here celebrating our birthday - could not have been more special. Highlights are many- the beautiful friendly and helpful staff top the list. The food, the pool, the view, the rooms and of course those bath tubs!! Thank you all for everything!!

REVIEW.Name: Kate McGarvey
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had the most wonderful stay here. The staff have been amazing and it has been so relaxing. We had the most incredible wedding day here - a day we will never forget. Thank you again for making our wedding dreams come true. We don't want to leave but hopefully we will be back in the future.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Exclusive Wedding Bali Exclusive Wedding
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had such an amazing time staying at Taman Ahimsa. The staffs are very welcoming and are so so helpful. We have made some amazing memories here. Thank you for everything.

REVIEW.Name: Adam Garriga
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a lovely stay we had at Taman Ahimsa. Thank you for taking such good care of us. A very special thanks for a wonderful 40th Birthday Celebration too! All my best.

REVIEW.Name: Trevor Conway
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our time in Taman Ahimsa has been amazing. Thank you very much for your kind hospitality. The food and drink was amazing. We will all miss the wonderful coffee in the morning. Many thanks and hopefully see you again.

REVIEW.Name: The Seven Group (PT Maharta, PT Bukit Buluh)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: All our dreams come true at Taman Ahimsa. The service and staff are amazing. The location and facilities are amazing. We had our wedding here and could not have asked for a better day. Thank you

REVIEW.Name: Halifah Fadiah
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A dream place to celebrate our wedding. We all had with our family and friends a wonderful time with guests. Support of all the house employee, the rooms were beautiful and really comfortable. We are leaving this place with really happy and hoping one day to come back.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for an unforgettable start into 2017. It can't get any better. We felt like staying with good friends all day. Hope to make it soon again to Bali and Prama and her team. Awesome! 5 stars.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A memorable and unforgettable vacation. Beautiful place and will come back again one day

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a lovely villa!!! Thank you for the staff servicing. We had a wonderful vacations.

REVIEW.Name: PT. Oleg Bali International tours ( OBI TOURS )
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had really nice these days here. Pool, yards and very friendly and helpful staffs make this holiday amazing.

REVIEW.Name: RICKY FUNG
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We spent five days in these wonderful place, staffs were nice, friendly and helpful. Foods were great. Beautiful view and great landscape of the garden, will definitely visit again in the future.

REVIEW.Name: Constance Wong
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We spent five days in this wonderful place, staff were nice, friendly and helpful. Food was great! Beautiful view and great landscape of the garden, will definitely visit again in the future.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Ten friends from Sydney come to Bali to celebrate a 50th birthday and we found a paradise and genuine hospitality. Thank you for taking such good care of us. We will miss this little piece of heaven.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Second visit to Taman Ahimsa. Enjoyable as usual. Will come back next year.

REVIEW.Name: Shane Wintershoven
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The perfect location for our wedding and family vacation. The rooms, service, food and atmosphere were amazing and the staff extremely friendly and attentive. Prama, Edi, Ayu and the team made sure we felt welcome and comfortable. We leave here very relaxed with smiles on our faces, fat bellies and incredible memories. We will be back to celebrate an anniversary soon.

REVIEW.Name: Nicila Anne Morgan Gabb
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A more beautiful and peaceful setting than that here at Taman Ahimsa is hard to imagine. That complete with the warmth, friendliness and hospitality of all the staff have made this a truly relaxing and wonderful holiday for us all which we will long remember. We have enjoyed our week here. Great food, delicious cocktails (thanks Eddie) and perfect pool. Thanks Taman Ahimsa team.

REVIEW.Name: Yvonne Donohoe
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Taman Ahimsa for an amazing holiday. Thank you to all of the staff who were so friendly and helpful. We loved every part of our stay in paradise.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Prama, you and your staff were fantastic! Thank you so much for taking care of us so wonderfully. It was a wonderful vacation and you all went out of your way to make sure we had the best time possible. Thank you and all our love!

REVIEW.Name: Jeanne Schmulian
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a truly spectacular week of great food in a beautiful setting with kind, friendly staff and exceptional service. Your patient and consistent attention to every details is a tribute to uniqueness of Balinese culture. In appreciation for Prama and all her staff!

REVIEW.Name: Sara Habanananda
REVIEW.ROverallComments: All i can say is thank you. This is the most magical place i have ever stayed in. Prama, Chef and the staff have been amazing. We will be back to enjoy Bali.

REVIEW.Name: Paola Cortese
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I would like to thanks all the staff for such a wonderful service and great experience. On behalf of my brother and my new sister, thanks for making their wedding so special.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We can't thank the Taman Ahimsa staff enough for making our stay and our wedding so beautiful and care free. This has to be one of the most spectacular spots on the planet and we very much hope to return one day. Lots of love and heartfelt thanks.

REVIEW.Name: Sarita Amanda Ayu Beaudoin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Took two years worth of planning 6 flights, 16 people, 5 years of saving and tons of organization to get to where we are today. My wife (newly weds) found Taman Ahimsa in 2014, we loved the idea of having our wedding in Bali. We paid a visit to the villa and instantly become enamored by the 'feel', the architecture, the beach and fine details. Although getting here proved to be challenging, once we got here we were living it up. Perhaps this place is a close to paradise as we will ever come close to. For those looking for a sign that "Taman Ahimsa" is for you. Then look no further. Truth, beauty and all the great things in life is right in front of you. Special thanks to all of the Taman Ahimsa staff and Elite Havens. May we meet again.

REVIEW.Name: Katherine Hubbard
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We cannot thank you enough to Prama and the wonderful team at Taman Ahimsa for all you have done for us. You have made our holiday and our wedding day unforgettable, magical, wonderful, perfect. Everyday here has been so special. The food has been spectacular and the service has been fantastic. You all are so kind and have beautiful smiles for us everyday, greeting us, tidying up after us, making our rooms beautiful and sharing this wonderful island with us. We are so sad to leave but have beautiful memories to keep us going when we are back home. We will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What an amazing place, we were lucky enough to have a beautiful wedding here and could not have asked for anything more. The staff are incredible and have made our stay one to remember. The villas themselves mixed with an amazing setting makes for one of our favorite spots in Bali. Memories that will last a lifetime.

REVIEW.Name: Tenteram Fine Foods
REVIEW.ROverallComments: From the time of our arrival, we have been blown away, amazing location, stunning landscape and the most beautiful staff. Our wedding here has been more than we thought possible, fun, laughs, love and fantastic life long memories. We feel privileged to have been lucky enough to stay here and look forward to our return one day. So blessed to have come to Taman Ahimsa and experienced this amazing location. We leave here filled with love and wonderful memories spent with family and friends.

REVIEW.Name: Emma Clements
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for an amazing stay. We love this villa and definitely will come back again.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Three days is far too short to stay in such a beautiful place. From start to finish, the staff have been completely delightful. Although we haven't had any weddings here, everyday has brought the love and happiness of ten weddings. We couldn't have asked for a better stay.

REVIEW.Name: Vara Wedding.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Absolutely awesome place to stay. Staff were really nice and helpful. Our wedding night was out of this world. Highly recommended to everyone. 5 star service!

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What an amazing visit! Everyone was kind and helpful. We had the most amazing time with our family and friends.

REVIEW.Name: Cher Ange Weddings & Events
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic place for a wedding. We will always remember Taman Ahimsa. The staff have been excellent, the views spectacular. A world class location. Thank you very much.

REVIEW.Name: PT. Bali Dreamday PT. Bali Dreamday
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Unbelievable! What a place, very happy memories for us all. The staff have been fantastic!

REVIEW.Name: Ceri Anne Smih
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all so much for such a wonderful stay. You couldn't have made our wedding more perfect if you tried. The whole group had an incredible time. We don't want to leave!

REVIEW.Name: BOOKING BALI VILLAS (CV. BALI VILLA INTERNATIONAL) BOOKING BALI VILLAS (CV. BALI VILLA INTERNATIONAL)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Such a beautiful place and great view. the service of staffs were met our expectation. We all very impressed and planning to come back on may next year. Thank you so much..

REVIEW.Name: Villa Novo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for our wonderful stay at this beautiful retreat. The staff were very helpful and caring - looking after our every read. The accommodation was wonderful - especially the outside bathroom. Everyone love the food and our fantastic BBQ outdoor. Having to be back sometime and good wishes to all.

REVIEW.Name: WUHU MILLIONAIRE
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was a great stay. Thank you for all staff for your warm welcome and high standard of hospitality. The food was so delicious. Hopefully we can meet again in the future.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The Taman Ahimsa is very beautiful and the environment is quite good. We all felt really comfortable. Prama and all the staff here are all friendly as well as responsible. We had a memorable wedding and holiday. We plan to celebrate the anniversary of our wedding here, and we wish the paradise will be better and better. Thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We came for a 70th birthday. Thank you for the wonderful staff at Taman Ahimsa. The villa is amazing and the setting beautiful. Its a perfect place for families and my children loved every minute of the stay. Hope to visit again

REVIEW.Name: Annette Patricia Therese English
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all the wonderful staff for the amazing service and attention for all who stayed. We absolutely loved the food, the rooms and Bali hospitality. We are sad to be leaving but will be returning home refreshed and ready to start planning another peaceful trip back.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What an incredible stay for us and our family. Wedding day was magical and will forever hold some of our best memories.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for looking after us at this very special time in our lives - the marriage of Richard and Olga. We have had a wonderful time and thank you for all your kindness.

REVIEW.Name: Natsuko Ioka
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had wonderful holiday. Taman Ahimsa is great place to have a wedding. This trip become a wonderful memory. Thanks to the staff of Taman Ahimsa.

REVIEW.Name: Ramesh Virjibhai Shah
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We are extremely delighted to choose this villa for our family's vacation to Bali. We cannot express our satisfaction and joy in words about our stay at one of your magnificent villas at Cemagi. This is only possible because of your very kind and cooperative staff and manager. All of them were always smiling and have taken care of our stay. It has been one of the most memorable holidays at your prestigious property. We will recommended this property to our friends and associates back in Mumbai, India. Also, we may come again to experience your hospitality too. Keep it up with same quality.

REVIEW.Name: Claire Louise Randall
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A totally beautiful place to have our wedding. When you arrive it's like " WOW" from the entrance you walk in to the beach front. Rooms were amazing which gives the relaxation feel when you step in. Staff, all of them so friendly, helpful, caring looked after all of us perfectly. Would totally recommended Taman Ahimsa for any occasion.

REVIEW.Name: Yana Group / Yana Property
REVIEW.ROverallComments: My family and I had an amazing time at Taman Ahimsa Villa. The staff are incredibly friendly and very professional. The property, its interior and design is very warm and welcoming. It feels like being home while on vacation. I wish all of my vacation were similar to the experience we had here. All of our requests from organizing flowers, local artist, buying phone cards or planing tours were arranged by the management. we would gladly come back to this villa in the future. Most of all the most important aspect of the villa is the sincere thoughtfulness of the staff. We wish you all peace and prosperity for many years to come. Thank you for such an amazing experience.

REVIEW.Name: Rachael Viles
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks for the most spectacular wedding. The setting and service was perfect. Will Cherish memories here forever.

REVIEW.Name: Alex Fischer
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had the opportunity to spend a beautiful week in your amazing villa. We therefore like to thank you for the friendly and very professional service. It would be a pleasure for us to come back once in a while to enjoy your excellent place.

REVIEW.Name: Mata Bali Mata Bali
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Amazing staff! Great food and generally exceptional when it comes to hospitality. The villa itself could do more with some minor maintenance but this is minor when it comes to the overall experience. The team here is amazing with their “can do” attitude.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We spent a fantastic holiday at Taman Ahimsa. Good service, good accommodation and venue. Staff here are very professional and peaceful, we like the smile on their face. Would definitely stay at Taman Ahimsa again when we come to Bali next time, highly recommended.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We love the villa since we arrive in the Villa, We were really enjoy the beach, pool and the great service from the staff. Here we can feel the sea breeze, sun bathing and sound of the wave. Thank you to all staff that serve us with heart, and we wish could back one day.

REVIEW.Name: Andianstyle
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had the most amazing special wedding. The staff were so beautiful and could not do enough for us. Thank you for the great hospitality and we will be back again.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Wedding Butler Bali Wedding Butler
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for this most amazing experience. Thank you to all staffs at the villa, you are all great at your job and we wish you well and we wish we could stay forever.

REVIEW.Name: The Seven Group (PT Maharta, PT Bukit Buluh)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all of the at Taman Ahimsa who made our stay so memorable. We have loved every minute of our time here. You have been incredibly attentive and accommodating, we will most definitely be back one day. Suksma..our love for you and your families.

REVIEW.Name: Alexander Judo Chan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Had the most wonderful, perfect wedding with 50 of our closed family and friends. The staff were so friendly and accommodating. Literally everything exceeded our expectations. We will treasure these memories forever and ever. Can't wait to come back and visit soon. With love.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for your kindness and hospitality. We enjoyed ourselves to the maximum with excellent service and food - enjoyed the fresh lobster. Everyone is always taking care of us with love. We hope to see you all soon.

REVIEW.Name: Cher Ange Weddings & Events
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for such a lovely stay at this amazing villa. We knew from the moment we walked in that this would make the most perfect wedding venue. Staying the extra days to enjoy the space before and after was also such a great decision. The villa staff were so amazing and helpful, making our stay both comfortable and relaxing.

REVIEW.Name: Build My Wedding Bali
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful stay, even better wedding. Thank you to the kind and helpful staff. Amazing place.

REVIEW.Name: TA Vilondo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to Prama and the team who made these 10 days an unforgettable experience. We especially want to thank you for all the efforts you put into our 50th anniversary - a day we will always remember. Our best wishes to you all.

REVIEW.Name: Vara Wedding.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: When we booked Taman Ahimsa for our wedding, we knew it would be beautiful. What we didn't expect was the "WOW" factor this place has walking in. Guest came from 16 different countries and we loved seeing everyone faces as they arrived and had the same reaction. The party was a lot of fun but what we really appreciated were the quiet moments with family before and after the wedding. Thank you for making this extra special.

REVIEW.Name: Sally Green
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for having us at Taman Ahimsa. The villa is very peaceful and a lovely way to spend a week! Thanks to the gorgeous staff who could accommodate any request and were always there with a smile. We would love to return someday.

REVIEW.Name: Janine Jialin Wu
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had an wonderful wedding here. Our family and friends enjoyed it so much - they would give up their jobs in Germany to work here. The view and the staff here are so sweet and wonderful. "heaven will be like here". We will definitely return again. Thank you to the beautiful villa staff for the service.

REVIEW.Name: Asia Villas Limited
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is our forth time stay in Taman Ahimsa and as usual this villa always provide us great service and privacy. Feels like home. Thank you for all staff for the service and hospitality. For sure we will come back again with another group.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for wonderful stay at the villa and the welcome at the village celebration. We had a fantastic time, and a big thank you to the whole staff. You are all so kind and professional. Many Thanks.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thousands of thanks to the crew and staff. Everything was wonderful and the wedding was perfect here. The food was also delicious. I would highly recommended Taman Ahimsa to anyone! Look forward to coming back again one day, thanks a bunch.

REVIEW.Name: Like Us Co. Ltd Like Us Co. Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This villa was amazing. Butlers and other staff are very gentle. We spent a great time in here. Thank you very much for serving and hosting us.

REVIEW.Name: John Francis Philipp SR
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a truly beautiful paradise! The villa has been a fun and special retreat and place to celebrate our daughters 16th Birthday! The staff have been wonderful and helpful, we appreciate you all. We also appreciate our driver who was kind enough to show us all around Bali and laugh at all crazy car rides. We especially loved Ayu our butler and her kindness and friendship with our daughter. She is a very special and wonderful person. Thank you so much and hope to see you again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Carolyn Mcewin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We spent a week at Taman Ahimsa with our extended family and had the most amazing time. The staff were always helpful and the facilities were outstanding. To have the whole villa to ourselves was fantastic, allowing us to spread out and feel at home. It was such a magical place for our holiday and we will cherish our time together as a family for years to come. Thank you, we would highly recommend this beautiful villa.

REVIEW.Name: Vara Wedding.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Taman Ahimsa is definitely the best place for a wedding. Both of our families flew from the side of the world. Flying over from US, Taiwan and France they were surprised and astonished by the beauty and the vibe of this villa. Our wedding is definitely one of a kind which is something that people can only dream of. Thanks to Taman Ahimsa with all the great little details - the perfect ocean view and wonderful setting. Could not ask for more, truly a paradise for all of us.

REVIEW.Name: Top Indonesia Holidays Top Indonesia Holidays
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What an amazing find! Taman Ahimsa is a Bali paradise. We were looked after like "Kings and Queens" by Prama and her team of friendly faces. Feeling very lucky to have experienced Bali at its best. Thank you for everything.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much to the staff of Taman Ahimsa. We had a fabulous stay, everything was perfect. We will cherish these memories always.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Girls trip to Bali was an experience of a lifetime. Staying here at this beautiful, clean, comfortable, marvelous villas was truly relaxing and so peaceful, making this trip memorable. Thank you so very much to all the staffs for making us all feel so welcome and being so accommodating day and night. You were all amazing! The 2 birthday celebrations were magnificent. We truly look forward to making our way back to Bali and will definitely be sure to stay here.

REVIEW.Name: Jessica Ella Mitchell
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We can't begin to thank you enough for all of the care that you and your team have provided to us during our stay. Your villa is absolutely beautiful and provided us with the perfect setting to become husband and wife. All our love

REVIEW.Name: Blake George Davis
REVIEW.ROverallComments: You will forever be my most faith favorite destination! I have never felt so spoiled. Our wedding was absolutely magical. Thank you for all your loving care to make it the most beautiful wedding a family could ask for. This our second time here and it just gets better and better! All the love.

REVIEW.Name: Greg Turner Allen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much to all the staff for an amazing time and outstanding service. A beautiful Bali experience. Thank you for all the great food.

REVIEW.Name: PT. BALI HAPPY EVENTS
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We can not say enough about what an incredible place Taman Ahimsa is and what an amazing experience the last few days have been. From the tranquility of the environment, to the beauty of the villa, to the amazing and hospitable staff - we could not have asked for a better vacation. Every morning we were greeted with smiles and enjoyed a delicious breakfast - such a great way to start each day. The staff would then help us with anything for the rest of the day - arranging massages, just making each minute of our time truly enjoyable. Everything was so clean and of such high standards - there was not one thing we could find fault in. We could recommended Taman Ahimsa to all of our family and friends, and we can't wait for our next trip back. A special heartfelt thank you to Prama and Eddy for everything you have done to make this an unforgettable trip. Thank you to all the staff for their warmth and kindness. We will take this amazing experience and keep it in our hearts.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: An absolutely delightful stay. The setting and villa are beautiful. They offer a tranquil oasis of relaxation and enjoyment. The staffs were attentive and always happy to help.

REVIEW.Name: WUHU MILLIONAIRE
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The meals and the service have been wonderful. The kids really enjoyed the time in the pool and at the beach. Thank you all for the service. We will definitely introduce this villa to our friends in China.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Wedding Paradise Bali Wedding Paradise
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had an amazing wedding, thank you for the outstanding hospitality. We have all the service we expected and we will cherish our time together as a family. Would totally recommended Taman Ahimsa for any occasion.

REVIEW.Name: Deborah Yuklan Wong
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a beautiful time with lovely people who took care of us. Music instruments to play, gardens, paintings and food that we loved. Bali culture is very special and shall travel with us until the next time we come here. We are already planning. Thrilled with the village, our baby children playing with the staff a long the way. I loved the experience.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Lovely villa with very food, staff and hospitality. We were very happy with the service. The staff was and helpful. Ibu Prama guaranteed us well and made this 40th birthday of my husband very memorable. Thanks and see you again.
